definition: to think of/to long for/to miss

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: I don't want to lonely sitting recalled miss, take up, put down.
sentences.chinese: 我不想孤单坐在回忆了思念，拿得起，放得下。

sentences.english: In thoughts from the visions of the night, when deep sleep falleth on men
sentences.chinese: 在思念夜中，异象之间，世人沉睡的时候。

sentences.english: But the plans of the Lord stand firm forever, the purposes of his heart through all generations.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的寿算永远立定，他心中的思念万代常存。

sentences.english: Miss the emotion that I shed tears of missing.
sentences.chinese: 怀念的情思使我流下思念的泪水。

sentences.english: Do not meet does not mean not miss, do not contact just to cover up nostalgic.
sentences.chinese: 䇓翱不见面不等于不思念，不联络只是为了掩饰眷恋。

sentences.english: That a separate the world empty thoughts, like poison, always let a person willing to sink.
sentences.chinese: 那一份隔世离空的思念，宛如毒药，总让人甘愿沉沦。

sentences.english: Ache is achy , miss is achy , too .
sentences.chinese: 渴望是痛，思念也是一种痛。

sentences.english: You know you're thought of lovingly each day throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 您知盗我们无日不把你亲切思念。

sentences.english: Half an hour later, they met the old man whom they miss all the time.
sentences.chinese: 半个小时后，他们终于见到了日夜思念的亲人。

sentences.english: Missing the grass and trees in the college.
sentences.chinese: 思念大学里的一草一木。

sentences.english: I'm sure she will miss her son more than she thinks for.
sentences.chinese: 我相信她思念儿子的程度要比她想像的强烈得多。

sentences.english: I would like to know that those who fled south, the birds who actually took the yearning.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，那些仓皇南飞的鸟群究竟带走了谁的思念。

sentences.english: The soldiers are still lamenting for their families.
sentences.chinese: 战士还在为思念亲人而叹息。

sentences.english: I think that there are fairies at the miss will turn into sorrow into the rain.
sentences.chinese: 我想，定是有仙子在思念，化作忧伤成雨。

sentences.english: I can not thinking about you .
sentences.chinese: 涐不能停止対尔的思念。

sentences.english: Forgot that your I cannot achieve, missing arrives at your indifference.
sentences.chinese: 忘记你我做不到，思念抵不过你的冷漠。

definition: to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to worry about/to be concerned about
to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
to leave (on a long journey)/to part from sb
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
